apple.translation[0].definitions[0].defi: a hard round fruit that has red, light green, or yellow skin and is white inside
apple.translation[0].definitions[0].exam: roast pork and apple sauce  (=a thick sauce made from cooked apples)
apple.translation[0].note_box[0].section: This apple’s really sweet and delicious.
Some people prefer a slightly sour apple.
There were a few rotten apples lying on the ground.
Use dessert apples for this recipe.
Some people say that you should eat an apple every day.
Sue bit into her apple with a loud crunch.
He was munching on an apple.
Peel the apples and slice them finely.
Core the apples and cut into quarters.
apple.translation[1].definitions[0].defi: a US computer company whose best-known products include the iPod, iPad, and iPhone
apple.translation[1].definitions[1].defi: a type of computer made by this company. These machines are regarded as being easy to use, and have a different operating system from PCs. They are usually called ‘Macs’.
